#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		string s;cin>>s;
		int n=s.length(),g=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			if(s[i]=='2'||s[i]=='3'||s[i]=='4'||s[i]=='5'||s[i]=='6'||s[i]=='0'||s[i]=='7'||s[i]=='8'||s[i]=='9'||s[i]=='1'){
			if(s[i]=='1')g=g+1;if(s[i]=='2')g=g+2;if(s[i]=='3')g=g+3;if(s[i]=='4')g=g+4;if(s[i]=='5')g=g+5;
			if(s[i]=='6')g=g+6;if(s[i]=='7')g=g+7;if(s[i]=='8')g+=8;if(s[i]=='9')g+=9;	
			}
		}cout<<g<<endl;	}
}
